snippet.title: Aeon Drive - Official Developer Walkthrough | gamescom 2021
snippet.description:
Learn everything you need to know about the 2D speed-run focused platformer Aeon Drive in this developer walkthrough. You only have 30 seconds to beat each level, but fortunately, you're able to pick up time capsules that can each add 5 seconds of time, along with a lightning fast teleportation dagger that you can throw and warp to instantly. Aeon Drive releases on September 30, 2021 on Steam, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch

Thanks for checking out gamescom 2021 on IGN. Be sure to visit IGN from August 25th through August 27th for the daily gamescom 2021 stream to check out shows like gamescom Opening Night Live, gamescom Awesome Indies, and gamescom Best of show. And for gamescom 2021 highlights, IGN will have them all. Throughout gamescom2021,  we’ll be dropping new gamescom announcements, gamescom reveals, and gamescom trailers you don’t want to miss.

#IGN #gamescom2021
